summary: Chatterji is an ambitious and self-made young man who becomes the director of the company he works for.
cast: Sharmila Tagore|Barun Chanda|Paromita Chowdhury|Ajoy Banerjee|Haradhan Bannerjee|Rahul Bhagat|Tarun Bhattacharya|Rita Deb Burman|Barry Chakraborty|Ratna Chatterjee|Ritun Chatterjee|Harindranath Chattopadhyay|Eric Davis|Dipankar Dey|Dipak Dutta|Althia Ensob|Minakshi Ganguly|Promode Ganguly|Amalendu Gupta|Mani Iyer|Prashanta Kumar Mallick|Basudeb Mukherjee|Anita Mukhopadhyay|G.V.R. Murthy|Parameshwar Pandey|Manju Puri|Indira Roy|Kalyan Sen|Shefali|Miss Shefali|Rambrij Thakur|Vishnu Vaswani|Peter Wales|John Watkin
title: Seemabaddha
